title: BRIEF-Corum Group Ltd Announces Collaboration Agreement With Bamm Group Administration Pty
text:
BRIEF-Corum Group Ltd Announces Collaboration Agreement With Bamm Group Administration Pty

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 24, 2019 23:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Corum Group Ltd Announces Collaboration Agreement With Bamm Group Administration Pty Sept 24 (Reuters) - Corum Group Ltd : * ANNOUNCES SAAS TECHNOLOGY COLLABORATION AGREEMENT WITH BAMM GROUP ADMINISTRATION PTY LTD * AGREEMENT WILL FOCUS ON DEVELOPMENT OF SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS FOR MULTI-STORE MANAGEMENT AND IN-STORE RETAIL OPERATIONS * AS CONSIDERATION FOR TECHNOLOGY AND CO-DEVELOPMENT CONTRIBUTION, CORUM HAS AGREED TO ISSUE 63.6 MILLION SHARES TO CO-DEVELOPER

BRIEF-Corum Group Ltd Announces Collaboration Agreement With Bamm Group Administration Pty
description: BRIEF-Corum Group Ltd Announces Collaboration Agreement With Bamm Group Administration Pty
